message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your effort. However, I am only willing to pay up to $150 for it.
I understand that $150 is your top price, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $165.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still cannot exceed $150 for the product.
I'm still willing to make a compromise, Bob. I'm reducing my price to $160. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. However, I must stick to my maximum budget of $150 for this product.
